intro: Anadenia triternata, commonly known as the pink fairy tern, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Acanthaceae family and is characterized by its striking pink to purple flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and prefers full sun exposure. It has narrow, linear leaves and produces small, showy inflorescences. Anadenia triternata is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens due to its vibrant floral display.
